item.title: About me
item.description: Passion and curiosity, two words that describe my lifestyle. Native of the Ardennes, I have always been very curious about the world of science. This led me to discover the digital world and programming at a young age. My first language, the one that made me discover algorithms and the way to code, is Java. In a high school in Sedan, I obtained a baccalaureate S - Engineering Sciences, which allowed me to satisfy my technical curiosity, through the teaching of mechanics, electrical engineering and computing.
